context: We have data from direct marketing campaigns (phone calls) of a Portuguese banking institution. The dataset contains client information (age, job, marital status, education, credit default status, account balance, housing loan, personal loan) and information about the marketing campaign contact (contact type, day of week, duration, number of contacts, previous campaign outcomes). Each feature represents either demographic information about the bank client or details about the marketing contact.
task: classifying whether a client will subscribe to a term deposit (yes) or not (no)

feature_descriptions.job: Type of job (categorical): 'admin.', 'blue-collar', 'entrepreneur', 'housemaid', 'management', 'retired', 'self-employed', 'services', 'student', 'technician', 'unemployed', 'unknown'. 'unknown' means the information was not provided.
feature_descriptions.default: Has credit in default? (binary): 'no', 'yes' (note: very few 'yes' cases; 'unknown' is sometimes present but officially listed as binary yes/no).
feature_descriptions.balance: Average yearly balance (numeric / integer, in euros). Can be negative.
feature_descriptions.day: Last contact day of the month (numeric / integer, 1-31).
feature_descriptions.month: Last contact month of the year (categorical): 'jan', 'feb', 'mar', 'apr', 'may', 'jun', 'jul', 'aug', 'sep', 'oct', 'nov', 'dec'.
feature_descriptions.duration: Last contact duration, in seconds (numeric / integer). Important note: this is highly predictive of the outcome but should be used with caution â€” duration is only known **after** the call is made (so for pure prediction before calling, it should typically be excluded).
feature_descriptions.campaign: Number of contacts performed during this campaign and for this client (numeric / integer, includes last contact).
feature_descriptions.pdays: Number of days that passed by after the client was last contacted from a previous campaign (numeric / integer). Special value: -1 means the client was not previously contacted.
feature_descriptions.previous: Number of contacts performed before this campaign and for this client (numeric / integer).
feature_descriptions.poutcome: Outcome of the previous marketing campaign (categorical): 'unknown', 'other', 'failure', 'success'.
